document_data.caption: Catti-brie and ''Taulmaril''.
document_data.name: Taulmaril
document_data.type: +3 [[Force]] [[keen]] [[elven bow|elven]] [[longbow]]{{Cite web/The Lone Drow: Companions of the Hall}}
document_data.text: ''Catti-brie spotted a better target. She swung the bow toward the back of the ship and sent a silver arrow streaking down. It blasted into the arm of the catapult, cracking the wood.''
document_data.mainbody:
===Quiver===
The bow was also accompanied by the [[Quiver of Anariel]], which contained twenty +1 [[alchemical silver]]

After the [[Spellplague]], the arrows were depicted as having a [[Lightning arrow|lightning]] effect. Additionally, the arrows could apparently be enchanted with light to create a [[torch]].

document_data.History: Originally the [[longbow]] was a gift from Lady [[Anariel]], Sister of [[Faer√ªn]], to [[Clan Battlehammer]], but in [[1356 DR]], the [[Companions of the Hall]] entered the ruins of the Hall of [[Dumathoin]] in [[Mithril Hall]] and [[Regis]] found the bow hidden in a gap in the stone wall. Later, Catti-brie gave Taulmaril to [[Drizzt Do'Urden]] after she was injured in [[1370 DR]]. He kept the bow in his possession even after Catti-brie's rebirth, since she was no longer in practice and generally used her new proficiency in [[magic]].
